metadata.name: MacOS Emond Launch Daemon
metadata.comment: Detects additions to the Emond Launch Daemon that adversaries may use to gain persistence and elevate privileges.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('/etc/emond.d/rules/')) AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.plist')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('/private/var/db/emondclients/'))))

output.summary: Detects additions to the Emond Launch Daemon that adversaries may use to gain persistence and elevate privileges.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1546.014/T1546.014.md, https://posts.specterops.io/leveraging-emond-on-macos-for-persistence-a040a2785124
